mapper.sql: i_id, i_planlogid, i_actionid, ti_actiontype, v_actionunit, i_numbyplan, f_scoreweight, i_scorenum, v_comments, i_scoretime, dt_cdate, dt_ledate, ti_state,i_userid
mapper.select: select hal.* from h_action_log hal where hal.i_planlogid=(select id from h_plan_log where i_planid=#{pid} order by dt_cdate DESC limit 0,1);
select * from h_action_log where i_actionid=#{aid} order by dt_cdate desc limit #{m},#{n}

select hal.* from h_action_log hal inner join (select i_actionid,max(dt_cdate) max_dt_cdate from h_action_log where i_userid=#{uid} group by i_actionid) maxhal on hal.i_actionid=maxhal.i_actionid and hal.dt_cdate=maxhal.max_dt_cdate;

select hal.* from h_action_log hal left join h_plan_log hpl on hal.i_planlogid=hpl.id where hpl.i_planid=#{pid} and hal.i_actionid=#{aid} and hal.dt_cdate < #{cdate} and hal.ti_state=0 order by hal.dt_cdate desc limit #{len}

select hal.* from h_action_log hal left join h_plan_log hpl on hal.i_planlogid=hpl.id where hpl.i_planid=#{pid} and hal.i_actionid=#{aid} and hal.dt_cdate > #{cdate} and hal.ti_state=0 order by hal.dt_cdate asc limit #{len}
select hal.* from h_action_log hal left join h_plan_log hpl on hal.i_planlogid=hpl.id where hpl.i_planid=#{pid} and hal.i_actionid=#{aid} and hal.ti_state=0 order by hal.dt_cdate desc limit #{n}
select * from h_action_log where i_planlogid=#{pl_id} order by i_numbyplan ASC
mapper.insert: insert into h_action_log (i_id, i_planlogid, i_actionid, ti_actiontype, v_actionunit, i_numbyplan, f_scoreweight, i_scorenum, v_comments, i_scoretime, dt_cdate, dt_ledate, ti_state,i_userid) values (#{iId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{iPlanlogid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{iActionid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tiActiontype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{vActionunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iNumbyplan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fScoreweight,jdbcType=REAL}, #{iScorenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{vComments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iScoretime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dtCdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dtLedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tiState,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{iUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into h_action_log
i_id,
i_planlogid,
i_actionid,
ti_actiontype,
v_actionunit,
i_numbyplan,
f_scoreweight,
i_scorenum,
v_comments,
i_scoretime,
dt_cdate,
dt_ledate,
ti_state,
i_userid,

#{iActionid,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update h_action_log
i_planlogid = #{iPlanlogid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
i_actionid = #{iActionid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ti_actiontype = #{tiActiontype,jdbcType=TINYINT},
v_actionunit = #{vActionunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
i_numbyplan = #{iNumbyplan,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_scoreweight = #{fScoreweight,jdbcType=REAL},
i_scorenum = #{iScorenum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
v_comments = #{vComments,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
i_scoretime = #{iScoretime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
dt_cdate = #{dtCdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dt_ledate = #{dtLedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ti_state = #{tiState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
i_userid = #{iUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where i_id = #{iId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update h_action_log set i_planlogid = #{iPlanlogid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, i_actionid = #{iActionid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ti_actiontype = #{tiActiontype,jdbcType=TINYINT}, v_actionunit = #{vActionunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, i_numbyplan = #{iNumbyplan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_scoreweight = #{fScoreweight,jdbcType=REAL}, i_scorenum = #{iScorenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, v_comments = #{vComments,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, i_scoretime = #{iScoretime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dt_cdate = #{dtCdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dt_ledate = #{dtLedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ti_state = #{tiState,jdbcType=TINYINT}, i_userid = #{iUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT} where i_id = #{iId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
